title: ELIM White Recruitment (Mid/Top/Jungle) (D5+)
body:
ELIM Gaming is looking for for a **three** D5+ Players which can play **Mid,Jungle or Top** to be on the starting roster for ELIM White. ELIM White is run as a serious team with a competitive mentality . We currently have a manager/coach but are looking for some more enthusiastic supporting staff to help ELIM White move forward. Being part of the ELIM organisation provides benefits such as: having a sister team (ELIM Black) to scrim against, and fees for tournament entries and name changes covered.

Requirements:
- Diamond 5+ soloq ranking (exceptions can be made for high level platinum players who show a passion for improvement)
- Diverse champion pool
- Strong communication skills
- Ranked 5s experience
- A headset with a clear microphone
- Teamspeak 3
- Availability from Monday-Thursday, 7:30pm-10:30pm AEST (as well as some weekends, for tournaments)
- A willingness to accept and provide constructive criticism
- Name-change to ELIM tag (the cost of the change will be paid for by the organisation)

If interested, add "FrozenArrow" ingame or email elimfrozen@hotmail.com
